name: @bitcoinerlab/discovery
description: A TypeScript library for retrieving Bitcoin funds from ranged descriptors, leveraging @bitcoinerlab/explorer for standardized access to multiple blockchain explorers.
author: Jose-Luis Landabaso

scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:test
scripts.lint:
if [ "$ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG" != false ]; then echo '
⚠️  WARNING: ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG is not set to "false".
   Editors may show different results than the CLI linter.
   To fix permanently, add this to your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc:

   export ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=false
'; fi; ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=false eslint --ignore-path .gitignore --ext .ts src/ test/
scripts.updatelocalexplorer: cd ../explorer && npm install && npm run build && npm pack && mv *.tgz ../discovery && cd ../discovery && npm uninstall @bitcoinerlab/explorer && npm install ./bitcoinerlab-explorer-*.tgz && rm ./bitcoinerlab-explorer-*.tgz
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run tmpTester && NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-fetch" jest && npm run clearTmpTester
